PACC::SVG::Attribute

PACC::SVG::Attribute Class Reference
[Style attributes]

Container for a single style attribute.An attribute is a pair of name/value strings. Its only constructor is protected in order to restrict its usage. It will be sub-classed for specific SVG style attributes. More...

Detailed Description

Container for a single style attribute.

An attribute is a pair of name/value strings. Its only constructor is protected in order to restrict its usage. It will be sub-classed for specific SVG style attributes.
